name: Qualitative Cryptography : Investigating the role of qualitative research for cryptographic builders
description: Rachel Aux delves into the vital role of qualitative research for cryptographic builders, addressing challenges in open-source development and quantitative data collection. Discover why qualitative research is crucial for programmable cryptography and learn effective collection strategies.

speakers.name: Rachel
speakers.bio: Rachel leads design strategy for Privacy & Scaling Explorations.
